text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Pence promised 4 million tests by March 13! It is now 5 weeks later and you are touting 3.5 million tests??? 35K Americans have died. Our economy is in freefall. We need millions of tests PER DAY! https://t.co/L3VnoFDMBA
